de.fellmann.judge.skating

Class JudgementForFinal

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fellmann.judge.skating.JudgementForFinal

  • public class JudgementForFinal
extends java.lang.Object
    Judgement input data object for Skating system, including input validation.

    Represents all marks of a final round.

    Author:
    Hanno Fellmann

      • setMark

        public void setMark(int dance,
                    int competitor,
                    int judge,
                    java.lang.Byte value)
        Set a shown mark
        Parameters:
        dance - Index of the dance.
        competitor - Index of the competitor.
        judge - Index of the judge.
        value - Shown mark.

        Possible values: 0 = not set, 1 to competitor count = mark

        Throws:
        JudgingException - when input is of range.

      • isAllowAbort

        public boolean isAllowAbort()
        Returns if abortion judgement is allowed.
        Returns:
        True, if allowed.
        See Also:
        setAllowAbort

      • setAllowAbort

        public void setAllowAbort(boolean allowAbort)
        Set abortion judgement allowance.

        If several participants abort their performance, it might happen that all these couples get judged with the lowest possible mark. So, in a final of 6 competitors, if two abort their performance, both can be judged with the mark "6".
        This is by default not allowed by input validation. To accept such input, allowAbort must be set to true explicitely.

        Parameters:
        allowAbort - true to allow abortion input.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(int dance,
                                 int competitor)
        Returns the judgement for a competitor in a specific dance.
        Parameters:
        dance - Index of the dance.
        competitor - Index of the competitor.
        Returns:
        The judgement, for example "11232".
